review: My father Mr. Prakash Kulkarni was given proper consultation for heart valve surgery, by dr. Harin vyas. Th doctor was constantly keeping a check on my father's health and provided excellent guidance and all matters. I  would recommend him my eyes closed. Excellent doctor you are in safe hands.

He was a through gentleman in all respects, totally transparent in telling me his clinical observations about the state of my heart,did not find fault with the earlier doctors who had treated me and who were eminent cardiologists, did not resort to the strategem adopted by many "interventionist" cardiologists of frightening you , he had a friendly ,engaging manner and inspired confidence in me that I can trust him.F.M.
